column5: 15 minutes from IAH. 26 miles from Superbowl Activities (link below) Close to major highways. Hard working, middle aged family who loves to laugh. I'm a great cook, so if you care to share in our meals feel free to. We also do some Uber driving so (partial) transportation maybe an option. Room is great for singles, couples, or girlfriends. Carefree enviornment Events for Superbowl
column8: Your Superbowl Home away from Home
